channel.title: 8.9-magnitude quake triggers devastating Japan tsunami
channel.description:
at least 32 dead and a nuclear emergency declared after problems at plant
more info: http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/42023385/ns/world_news-asiapacific/?gt1=43001

item.title: 8.9-magnitude quake triggers devastating Japan tsunami
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:46, topic:385780”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=481534.msg3527377#msg3527377 date=1299940520]

Wiki:

At 08:55 EST on March 12, 2011, an unconfirmed report of Tajiri’s death in the 2011 Sendai earthquake and tsunami was posted to Twitter, resulting in a deluge of retweets and syndication of the information to various blog posts concerned with gaming, manga and anime and major news websites[21]. However, the posts were refuted with new information regarding the safety of Nintendo of Japan employees (including Tajiri), with Nintendo of America confirming that no employees of Nintendo of Japan were harmed by the catastrophe nor was any significant property damage sustained[22].

Thanks for my childhood, you will be remembered.

(Original creator of Pokemon)
[/quote]
Says he wasnt harmed, lol.[/quote]

Unconfirmed reports of him being alive of uncomfirmed reports of him being dead

Read full topic

@Phaze_One wrote:

At 08:55 EST on March 12, 2011, an unconfirmed report of Tajiri's death in the 2011 Sendai earthquake and tsunami was posted to Twitter, resulting in a deluge of retweets and syndication of the information to various blog posts concerned with gaming, manga and anime and major news websites[21]. However, the posts were refuted with new information regarding the safety of Nintendo of Japan employees (including Tajiri), with Nintendo of America confirming that no employees of Nintendo of Japan were harmed by the catastrophe nor was any significant property damage sustained[22].

Thanks for my childhood, you will be remembered.

(Original creator of Pokemon)

item.title: 8.9-magnitude quake triggers devastating Japan tsunami
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:18, topic:385780”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=481534.msg3526395#msg3526395 date=1299861415]

I love these tsunami warnings, it is fun to watch the tourists panic

You are the most inconsiderate arsehole I have quite possibly seen on these forums.

Go to here:
http://www.channel4.com/programmes/tsunami-caught-on-camera/4od
and watch it, you will see why they’re scared.
[/quote]

I didn’t say anything about Japan… I was talking about the tsunami warnings up and down the west coast. Everybody evacuates, and for what? A slight increase in wave size?[/quote]

CRESCENT CITY, Calif. — Tsunami waves spawned by a devastating earthquake in Japan battered Hawaii and the U.S. western coast Friday, flooding businesses, smashing dozens of boats at harbors and sweeping a man to his death.
u sir r stupid

Read full topic
